Alert Name: bush
World Bank president: 'I made a mistake'
Paul Wolfowitz apologizes for any conflict of interest created after the promotion and pay increase of his girlfriend, staffer.
04/12/07 05:52 PM, EDT
World Bank President Paul Wolfowitz said Thursday he made "a mistake for which I am sorry" over his handling of the promotion and pay increase of his girlfriend and staffer Shaha Riza.
